LanguageData.Apparel_ShieldBelt.label: barrierebelte
LanguageData.Apparel_ShieldBelt.description: En energibarriereenhed til en enkelt persone. It will attempt to stop any rapidly-moving projectile or energy attack that comes from a distance. It does nothing against melee attacks or shots from point-blank range. It also prevents firing past touch range.
LanguageData.Apparel_SmokepopBelt.label: smokepop belte
LanguageData.Apparel_SmokepopBelt.description: Et forsvarsrøgslør der udløses automatisk. Beltet vil frigive en tyk røgsky hvis bæreren bliver ramt af et projektil, som giver "line-of-sight" cover og forhindrer tårne i at sigte på bæreren. Engangsbrug.
